title: Did Joe Biden call the Americans Antiva brave?
subtitle: An old quote from Bayden pays tribute to the protestors who stood in front of white fanatics in Charlottesville doing tours in 2020.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Joe Baiden Antiva (against fascists), who clashed with white extremists in 2017, called Charlottesville, Virginia, a gathering of "American courage."
